\dOh. Are you alone, Kaede?\d%K%P
She was the only one out in the main hall.%K%P
\dSeems like it. Tomorrow's the big day, so the\nothers must be getting ready.\d%K%P
Kaede didn't seem to be busy herself, though.%K%P
\dI'm good to go already, so I'm just waiting for\ntomorrow.\d%K%P
\dShion still seems to be up to her tricks.\d%K%P
\dShe'll never learn, will she?\d%K%P
\dWhat's the matter Akira, are you worried?\d%K%P
\dWhat? No, uhh...\d%K%P
I knew that Shion was pulling one over on Kaede.%K%P
I just didn't feel right knowing about it.%K%P
\dRelax. I might not be on Shion's level, but I can\nplay clever too.\d%K%P
\dHaha, I guess that's true.\d%K%P
Maybe she had caught on already.%K%P
\dShion would be such a great Goddess if she just\nbehaved herself.\d%K%P
\dShe plays dirty, but she still works hard. I\nrespect her for that.\d%K%P
Shion was capable of things Kaede wasn't.%K%P
That itself was worthy of praise.%K%P
\dWhat do you think of Yukari, then...?\d%K%P
The two of them were in a more heated competition.%K%P
I wanted to get a sense of how Kaede really felt\nabout her.%K%P
\dYou like to ask the tough questions, huh?\d%K%P
\dYou don't have to answer if you'd rather not.\d%K%P
I'd asked mostly out of curiosity.%K%P
It wasn't like I was pushing her or anything.%K%P
\dNo, it's not that or anything...\d%K%P
\dBut I might be more inclined to answer if there\nwas something in it for me, you know?\d%K%P
\dFine. Within reason, at least.\d%K%P
\dDon't worry, I won't trouble you.\d%K%P
I dimmed the lights and waited for Kaede.%K%P
A short while later she came out with tea for us\nboth.%K%P
\dWow, the moon looks nice tonight...\d%K%P
This was all she had wanted - for the two of us to\nsit outside and gaze at the moon together.%K%P
It wasn't quite a full moon, but the autumn\nmoonlight illuminated the area.%K%P
\dSome otsukimi dango would have been great right\nabout now.\d%K%P
\dI have some bean daifuku, would you like one of\nthose?\d%K%P
\dNah, don't worry about it.\d%K%P
\dYes, I wouldn't want to spoil this moment.\d%K%P
She slowly slid over towards me.%K%P
I put my arm around her shoulder.%K%P
\dWell, this is nice!\d%K%P
\dYou sure seem happy.\d%K%P
\dIt's not every day I'm this lucky, right?\d%K%P
I guess she was right.%K%P
I couldn't remember a single time when I'd taken\nthe initiative with Kaede.%K%P
\dYou never do this sort of thing for me.\d%K%P
\dYou seem to do it for Yukari an awful lot,\nthough.\d%K%P
Her words were like needles.%K%P
She was right, I had a lot of physical contact with\nYukari to keep her Tatari on lockdown.%K%P
\dYeah, sorry about that.\d%K%P
\dI wasn't trying to guilt trip you.\d%K%P
\dI just wish you'd treat me the same. Seems like\nyou treat Shion pretty well too...\d%K%P
\dI-I do?\d%K%P
\dYou do. I'm the only one left out.\d%K%P
I had never intended it to be like that, but it\nseemed like Kaede felt that way.%K%P
\dAgain, I'm not mad. Not even at Yukari.\d%K%P
\dShe does irritate me sometimes...\d%K%P
\d...okay, maybe she irritates me all the time...\d%K%P
\d...but still, I'm thankful for her bringing this\nall about.\d%K%P
\dIf it wasn't for her, I wouldn't be here again\nwith you like this...\d%K%P
It had only been one time, but there had been\nsomething between us once.%K%P
But whether it was because of that or not, we\nstopped being able to just sort of naturally\ninteract with each other afterwards.%K%P
\dTo be honest, there's plenty a word I'd like to\nhave with Yukari.\d%K%P
\dBut thanks to her I've changed a bit myself. And\nthanks to that I'm enjoying myself more these\ndays...\d%K%P
\dSo to sort of pay her back for that, I figure I\ncan just try and accept her running around calling\nherself your wife.\d%K%P
Kaede had also claimed to be my better half in\nresponse.%K%P
It was probably more reactionary than anything, but\nnow it was just a matter of fact.%K%P
\dSorry if I've troubled you...\d%K%P
\dNo, not at all. I would have told you if you had.\d%K%P
\dWait, does that mean you're more into girls like\nYukari?\d%K%P
\dThat's not exactly it...\d%K%P
\dIt's just that she seems like she needs the\nhelp.\d%K%P
\dBut I'll bet she'd be pretty charming if she truly\nlaughed from the heart.\d%K%P
I wanted to see that smiling face at least once.%K%P
\dListen to you Akira... Talking like that with me\nstill in your arms.\d%K%P
\dSorry, sorry. But you know what I mean, right?\d%K%P
\dYes... I was a Tatarigami myself once, after all.\d%K%P
She smiled quietly to herself thinking back.%K%P
There were painful memories along with newfound\njoys.%K%P
\dI hope you succeed, Akira. I'll help if I can.\d%K%P
\dThanks. I can always depend on you, Kaede.\d%K%P
\dIt's to repay you for all the trouble I caused.\nThis is the least I can do.\d%K%P
\dYou really don't need to, though...\d%K%P
It was like we were both missing each other's\npoints.%K%P
But then we came to understand each other.%K%P
\dBut these are two different issues. I don't plan\non giving you up to anyone.\d%K%P
\dI know. That's why you're competing, right?\d%K%P
\dTomorrow I'm going all out. Though I'm a little\nworried about who you'll be cheering for...\d%K%P
\dDon't tell me, not yet. Just...stay here with me a\nbit longer...\d%K%P
Kaede rested her body against mine.%K%P
\dHold me tight. If you don't, I'm going to fall.\d%K%P
\dIn that case, I'd better hug you really close.\d%K%P
\dThat's more like it!\d%K%P
Her face melted into pure happiness and she\nreached out to touch me.%K%P
\dI've finally made it this far...\d%K%P
\dAnd I don't plan on running away now...\d%K%P
